shots.sentence: I made a coding agent using Python and Olama that runs on my 4-year-old MacBook M1.
shots.notes: Visual representation of the coding agent running on a MacBook to introduce the topic.

shots.sentence: This was a great learning experience to understand how more advanced coding agents like CloudCodeCode, Cursor and GitHub Copilot works under the hood.

compositionProps.titleText: Learning Experience: CloudCodeCode, Cursor, GitHub Copilot

shots.notes: Text overlay listing the advanced coding agents for clarity.

shots.sentence: It also showcases how small and local 8B models like when 8B that can literally run on your hardware for free perform under different coding tasks.

compositionProps.titleText: Small 8B Models: Win 8B on Your Hardware

shots.notes: Highlighting the efficiency of small, local models with a text overlay.

shots.sentence: This coding agent has a very minimal set of tools.
shots.notes: Simple text emphasizing the minimal toolset.

shots.sentence: The agent has access to the following tools.
The most used tools are RedFile, ListFiles, EditFile and Run command tools.
shots.notes: Lists the specific tools as a text overlay.
